ingredients: 3/4 pound dried porcini mushrooms, roughly chopped
1 pound pork butt, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 pound beef chuck, cut into 1-inch pieces
Kosher salt and cracked black pepper
Kosher salt and cracked black pepper
